features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次升级为您推出全新MagicOS 8.0系统，新系统更流畅、更安全、更好用、更省电，桌面更好玩，交互更高效便捷，推荐您更新体验。更多功能解锁敬请期待后续版本更新。
【流畅动效】采用了全新基于人因的动效设计，更自然舒适。应用启动/退出动画可打断动效，更连贯丝滑。
【桌面快捷服务】长按应用图标拖拽展开快捷功能，应用高频服务一键直达。
【全新文件夹】全新设计，提供了更多文件夹尺寸，桌面个性化定制更灵活。可通过长按文件夹，拖拽边框，自由调节。
【魔法锁屏】全新海报级魔法锁屏，您可以随心选择模板，玩转个性锁屏。
【卡片堆叠】桌面卡片呈现更丰富，支持同尺寸卡片堆叠，上下滑动可切换卡片，节省更多桌面空间。
【服务胶囊】YOYO建议卡片可切换为胶囊状态，让桌面更通透。体验路径：长按YOYO建议卡片->编辑默认样式->天气时钟+服务胶囊。
【桌面图标】支持桌面图标大小调节，满足用户对图标大小的不同显示需求，体验路径：“设置->桌面和个性化->桌面设置->图标大小”。
【分屏】新增一步手势分屏功能，应用全屏下拖动底部至左上角，点击其他支持分屏应用，即可实现应用分屏。
【悬浮窗】迷你窗支持移动和悬停到手机桌面任意位置。
【灵动胶囊】以“胶囊”形态显示进行中的任务，便于查看实时状态、执行快捷操作或快速进入应用，高效服务、准确触达。
【荣耀任意门】全新荣耀任意门，长按文字、图片左右拖拽触发任意门，快捷分享至应用或服务，打车导航、观影购物、搜索分享、打印收藏等服务一步直达，化繁为简、省时省心。
【收藏空间】全局收藏全新升级，万物皆可收藏，将图文、网页、视频、文件等素材快速收藏并显示到收藏空间，轻松收藏素材。点击展开收藏空间，长按单个或多个选中的内容，可拖出至其他应用使用。还可同步至信任环中其他设备，跨设备共享收藏的内容。
【个人事务助手】从日程工具到个人事务助手，日程全收纳。散落的日程自动解析帮您录入，“我的一天”全天事务清晰呈现，为您提供高效的个人事务管理服务。
【信任环】MagicRing技术持续突破，秒级组网，支持多业务并发，更多设备和服务加入信任环，以人为中心，应用跨端接续，服务高效流转。
【YOYO助理】 语音助手成长为YOYO助理，为您提供更贴心的智慧服务，欢迎体验。
【平行空间】将您的照片、视频、应用隐藏到平行空间，与主空间隔离，更好的保护您的个人隐私。双空间同时运行，移入移出更方便。体验路径：设置->安全->平行空间。开启后可通过桌面双指外划快速进入平行空间。
【屏幕共享保护】屏幕共享时，对方无法看到您的通知和消息。当系统检测到存在诈骗风险时，会主动示警并保护您的关键信息不泄露，如个人账号、密码、短信验证码等，保护您的财产安全。
【流量校准】支持流量校准功能。体验路径：设置->移动网络->流量管理。
【显示】优化部分视频通话场景的美颜效果。
【相机】后置相机支持慢动作拍摄。
【输入法】系统安全键盘支持数字9键输入。
【精彩回忆】精彩时刻升级为精彩回忆，优化回忆封面，根据视频内容，为您的回忆视频智能生成适合的背景音乐。
【相机模式布局自定义】支持相机模式的自定义布局，长按并拖动图标可将常用模式移动到浅层级功能区，操作更快捷。
【超级省电】新增超级省电模式，可以大幅提升手机续航。体验路径：设置->电池->超级省电模式。

1、本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2、请务必确保手机有10GB以上的内部存储空间，否则会有升级失败的风险。（查看存储空间方法：设置 -> 存储）。 3、因部分第三方应用与MagicOS 8.0不兼容，更新后可能会出现第三方应用无法正常使用的情况（如闪退、卡顿、耗电等）。建议您在应用市场尝试将该应用更新至最新版本，若仍无法解决问题，请您耐心等待应用更新信息，并及时更新。 4、升级后，系统进行自优化适配，可能会出现发热、耗电快、卡顿或充电慢的问题，正常使用2-3天后会恢复正常。建议升级完成后将手机灭屏充电1~2小时以上再重启手机，以保证手机应用快速适配完。 5、如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear users, this update has launched brand-new MagicOS 8.0 for you. The new system is smoother, safer, easier to use, more power-saving, and the home screen is more fun. We recommend you to update. Please stay tuned for upcoming version updates to unlock more features.

【Smooth animations】A brand-new, human-centered motion design is incorporated for a more natural and comfortable experience. Start/exit animation can interrupt the motion effect in apps. The process is more coherent and smoother.
【Quick services on home screen】Press and hold the app icon and drag to display the shortcuts, and you can directly access high-frequency services.
【New folder】A brand-new design provides more folder sizes, making customized home screen more flexible. You can adjust the folder freely by pressing and holding it and dragging the border.
【Magic Wallpaper】With brand-new poster-level Magic Wallpaper, you can choose the template as you like and have fun with your personalized lock screen.
【Card stack】More cards are presented on home screen. This update supports the stacking of cards of the same size, saving more space on home screen. You can swipe up and down to switch cards.

【Service capsule】YOYO Suggestions card can be switched to a capsule state to make the home screen more transparent. You can experience it by going to : Press and hold YOYO Suggestions card -> Edit default style -> Weather + Service capsule.

【THome screen icons】he size of Home screen icons can be adjusted to meet the users' different needs. You can experience it by going to: Settings -> Home screen and style -> Home screen settings -> Icon size.
【App Extender】 You can now enable App Extender with a single gesture. Drag the bottom to the upper right corner, and then tap the other app supporting App Extender to display apps in dual windows.
【Floating window】 Mini window can be moved and hovered to any position on the home screen.

【Magic Capsule】The Magic Capsule is displayed in the form of a "capsule", and presents ongoing tasks, making it easy to view real-time status, perform quick operations, or quickly enter applications. This function provides you with accurate and efficient services.

【Magic Portal】This update has provided brand-new HONOR Magic Portal. You can tap and hold text or images and drag them left or right to invoke Magic Portal and quickly share it to apps or services. You can have direct access to services including ride hailing and navigation, watching movie and shopping, searching and sharing, printing and collection. Magic Portal makes things easier and save much time for you.

【Favorites Space】Global Favorites has been newly upgraded, and everything can be collected. Images, texts, web pages, videos, files and other materials can be quickly collected and displayed in the Favorites Space, making it easy to collect materials. Tap to expand Favorites Space, touch and hold the selected one or multiple items, then you can drag them out to other apps. You can also synchronize them to MagicRing devices to share collected content across devices.

【Personal Assistant】The schedule tool has been upgraded to Personal Assistant to include all the schedules. This function can automatically analyze scattered schedules and record them. All-day affairs will clearly display in “My Daily schedule”, providing you with efficient personal affairs management.

【MagicRing】MagicRing technology continues to make breakthroughs, with second-level networking, supporting multi-service concurrency. More devices and services join MagicRing. MagicRing is people-centered, where applications are connected across devices, and services are efficiently transferred.
【YOYO Assistant】AI Voice is enhanced to YOYO Assistant to provide you with better intelligent services.

【Parallel Space】Your photos, videos, and apps can be hidden into Parallel Space that is isolated from the Main Space to better protect your personal privacy. Run two spaces at the same time, making moving in and out more convenient. You can experience it by going to: Settings -> Security -> Parallel Space. After enabling Parallel Space, you can quickly enter Parallel Space by swiping outward with two fingers on home screen.

【Screen sharing protection】When you are sharing screen, the other party cannot see your notifications and messages. When the system detects the risk of fraud, it will proactively alert you and protect your key information from leakage, such as personal account, password, SMS verification code, etc., to protect your property security.
【Data calibration】This update supports data calibration feature. You can experience it by going to: Settings -> Mobile network -> Data usage.
【Display】 The beauty effect is optimized in some video calls.
【Camera】 Rear camera supports slow-mo shooting.
【Keyboard】 Secure keyboard supports PinyinT9 input.

【Memories Highlights】Highlights is upgraded to Memories Highlights. This update has optimized the Memories album cover and can intelligently generate suitable background music for your Memory videos based on the video content.
【Custom Camera Layout】This update supports custom layout for camera mode. You can tap and hold icons to move frequently used modes to the shallow functional area for easier operation.
【Ultra Power Saving】Ultra Power Saving mode is added to largely improve battery life. You can experience it by going to: Settings -> Battery > Ultra Power Saving mode.

1. This update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Make sure your phone has more than 10GB of free storage space. Otherwise, the update may fail. (To check your storage space, go to Settings > Storage). 3. Some third-party apps may not be compatible with MagicOS 8.0 and may malfunction after the update (such as crash, lag, and abnormal power consumption). Please update your apps to the latest version in AppGallery. If the problems persist, please wait for upcoming app updates. 4. After updating, the system will adjust its settings to apply the optimizations. In the process, the device may become hot, consume power fast, lag, or charge slowly. But it will return to normal in 2-3 days of use. After the update is done and before restarting the phone, you are recommended to charge it with the screen off for 1-2 hours to ensure the optimizations are applied. 5. If you encounter any problem during use, you can get our support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website at https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
